评论详情: Just what I was looking for! Nice size, and has separate compartments to keep me organized

Just got this bag in the mail and it is PERFECT. It has 3 zip pockets and you can easily move a strap to carry it like a purse. It’s not too small and not too big but just the right size to carry what you need.

I like everything about this purse. The only thing I wish it has would be some feet so when I set it down, it’s not on the floor! It is a perfect size for everything I need. I love that you can switch the straps to over the shoulder to a back pack type purse!
I bought it for a trip to Disney and it was worth it. it have the perfect size. it's comfortable and it looks good with anything that you put on!!

评论用户: Super cute and great amount of pockets. But if you want a durable back pack purse, this is not it. Used it on a week long trip, and strap was broken by end. Just bought last month. Adorable for light use, but not very sturdy.
评论概述: Cute, but not durable for extended use
评论详情: Cute and love all of the pockets. If it was durable and didn’t break within a month, I’d have given it five stars. Good for light use.
Love it!  Great size and lots of strap options!
